jpansim2 0.3.1 API

JPanSim2 is a discrete time, stochastic agent based simulation for infectious disease outbreaks. Transmission is simulated on an explicit social network whose links are weighted by relationship closeness. Agents have in-host viral load and immunity models and a behaviour state model that governs mobility, test-seeking and compliance. The framework supports top-down policy interventions and flexible configuration to explore outbreak and behavioural scenarios.
